---
title: "MTA Subway Stations"
---

```{r include=FALSE}
stations <- utils::read.csv("../data/raw/MTA_Subway_Stations (1).csv")
```

```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

stations_sf <- stations |> 
  mutate(geometry = st_as_sfc(Georeference)) |> 
  st_as_sf()

leaflet(stations_sf) |> 
  addTiles() |> 
  addMarkers()
```

Make buffers around train stations with a dist of 1200, to find areas of inaccessibility farther than a 15 minute walk.

https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/osmdata/vignettes/osmdata.html

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
buffers <- st_buffer(stations_sf, dist = 1200)

ggplot(buffers) +
  geom_sf()
```
